content.text: Available for download on Apple App Store and Google Play.
content.warningiOS: Your browser is not compatible. Please open the link in Safari.
content.infoiOS: Press long on the link and choose “Open in Corona-Warn”.
content.infoAndroid: Press long on the link and choose 'Open link in external App'.
content.downloadInfo: If you have not yet installed the Corona-Warn-App, press here to install it.
content.warningAndroid: Your browser is not compatible. Please open the link in Chrome or enable the setting 'Open links in other apps'.
